::Spears::

She knelt down at Prebon's feet.  How could she decide between her 
love and her leader.  She cried and looked up at Prebon with tear 
stained cheeks.  She stood up and looked at Striker.  "No, the chip 
would kill him. I'll......I'll...I'll take you to Ramulus."
Her love for Striker over ruled her loyalty.  She felt her spark 
breaking at this.  


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, minime_316@h... wrote:
> Prebon
> 
> Prebon looked at Spears. Crying. Sign of weakness. That would be 
> corrected soon enough. But maybe her feelings for him can be a 
> strength for Prebon.
> 
> "Well,you have some choices. If you want, I would be glad to give 
him 
> the chip, and you could love each other, but be mine.  Or I will 
let 
> him go as a reward....for giving me Ramulus!"
